ygData.subject: The new orders

Far away from Earth, in a remote place in space, a dark mass obscured 
a sun. It was huge, about the size of a large moon. It was Unicron, 
Cybertron's bane.

He concentrated on his two children, Lunekill and Rockseeker, and 
sent them their new orders.

His terrible voice made even the nearby astral objects tremble out of 
fear from him...

Unicron: My children, these are your new goals, though I know you 
must already pursue them. Find the Matrix of Leadership. It is the 
only thing that I cannot destroy, and the only that can harm me. Make 
sure that no one - absolutely no one - leaves that planet alive. 
Block all transmissions. We must make sure that this jewel of a 
planet be mine!
